parameters.name: ApiId
parameters.description: The number of the API to be bound.

parameters.name: ApiIds
parameters.description: The number of the API to be operated. Separate multiple numbers with commas (,). A maximum of 100 numbers can be entered.

parameters.name: GroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the API group that contains the API to which the plug-in is to be bound.

parameters.name: PluginId
parameters.description: The ID of the plug-in to be bound.

parameters.name: StageName
parameters.description:
The name of the runtime environment. Valid values:

*   **RELEASE**
*   **PRE: the pre-release environment**
*   **TEST**
